Joshua White {#title}

### Cognitive & Data Scientist 

I'm a Cognitive & Data Scientist who recently finished his Honours in Psychology at the University of Melbourne. I have considerable experience as a research assistant at all levels of the scientific process. I have a particular interest in using computational methods and complex data analysis to better understand the mind, and have experience doing so with a variety of programs / programming languages. Previously, I worked as a litigation lawyer.
